input.sentences: there was a ceremony by the memorial today .
cadets were dressed in their finest uniforms .
bystanders and alumni saluted them as they marched past .
important people wanted to shake their hands .
output.sentences: I attended a ceremony on memorial day
We all got dressed in our finest uniforms.
People saluted as we marched past them
The mayor went down the line to shake hands with people
The parade was a very moving site.
